casename: Ong Kay Eng v Ng Chiow Tong
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; L P Thean JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Dwayne Tan Kok Heng (Chor Pee & Partners) for the Ong; Leslie Yeo Choon Hsien (LJ Wong & Yeo) for the Ng
tags-parsed: Partnership/Dissolution/Receivers appointed/Whether partner can bring an action in his own name on behalf of partnership under receivership/s 38 Partnership Act (Cap 391, 1994Ed).
Partnership/Partners inter se/Accounts/Whether former partner of dissolved partnership placed in receivership can seek order for account/Sufficient reasons
